The CLI E2E and unit tests cover core functionality, parsing, display, error handling, and no-updates scenarios. • “npm test” output shows 100% passing and >98% coverage, confirming full implementation of acceptance criteria.
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria (running npm outdated, parsing JSON output, displaying results, handling errors, and the no-updates case) are implemented and exhaustively tested. CLI help/version flags, unit and integration tests, and documentation in README satisfy the Definition of Done for this foundational story.
